title: Changes in the value of ecosystem services due to watershed development in India’s Eastern Ghats and incentives for better stewardship
content:
Publication date: February 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 65

Author(s): Suresh Kumar, M Madhu, Ranjay K Singh, Rajesh Kaushal, Ch. Jyotiprava Dash, Hombe H.C. Gowda, GW Barla
